room_title: Escape room "Ghost Hunters" by Escape Kings in Charlotte
room_address: 11333 Granite St., Suite B Charlotte, NC 28273
room_description: Paranormal activity has been detected at the abandoned Queens Hospital. Your team has been dispatched to search for ghosts in the hospital to report back your findings. You only have one hour of access inside the hospital before the clock strikes 6 am to exit. Can you find the ghost before time is up?
